炟字的基本解释

炟
dá
火起，爆。

炟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dá］
［《廣韻》當割切，入曷，端。］
光辉照耀。参见“炟爚”。

炟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　炟； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页668第04
【唐韻】【集韻】?當割切，音怛。【說文】火起也。【玉篇】爆也。又【後漢·章帝紀】肅宗孝章皇帝諱炟。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　炟; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 668 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? When cut and cut, the sound is daunting. [Said the text] The fire also started. [Jade articles] Burst too. Also [Later Han·Zhang Di Ji] Emperor Suzong Xiaozhang taboo.
